GeoID.description: Geolocation used to uniquely identify and object or to facilitate it's identification

natureoftheIDGeolocation.description: Nature of the reference point that has been used as an IDGeolocation.
enum: 1 Location of the front door of the head office
2 Centerpoint of the object/area of operation
3 Location on the object/area of opeartion
4 Location near the object/area of operation
5 location where the interview has taken place
